txt.en: Thromur can be found at Durin's Stone.\n\nYou have aided in the defeat of Urro One-hand and routed Bolg and the other Orcs at Durin's Stone. You should talk to Thromur.
After King Thráin and his vanguard set out to assault the gates of Khazad-dûm, a sudden revelation threatens to raise tensions between the Longbeards and the Zhélruka at Amdân.
Thromur can be found at Amdân.\n\nThromur, esquire of Frerin, has asked you to accompany him to confront Shálun. You should talk to Thromur.

'I misjudged him... Shálun, I mean. My master is lost, but the King and Thorin live because of his sacrifice.'

Thromur lets out a sorrowful sigh.

'The Iron-folk have come at last... I only hope it is not too late!'

'Shálun? I know him well indeed. This would not be the first time he has disrespected Frerin, but even I did not think he would stoop so low!

'Let us see what excuse he makes for this insult... this theft!

'Will you come with me, Hermáth? If you would bring your hammer, I would feel more at ease... though I should hope you need not use it!'
Talk to Thromur at Durin's Stone
